title: Part C
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions:
The response does not include an acceptable explanation. Acceptable explanations include the following.

路 A portion of the Golgi complex containing the aquaporin polypeptide buds off as a vesicle that fuses with the plasma membrane (allowing the aquaporin to embed in the membrane).

路 The aquaporin polypeptide is carried by a vesicle that fuses with the plasma membrane.

The response includes an acceptable explanation. Acceptable explanations include the following.

路 A portion of the Golgi complex containing the aquaporin polypeptide buds off as a vesicle that fuses with the plasma membrane (allowing the aquaporin to embed in the membrane).

路 The aquaporin polypeptide is carried by a vesicle that fuses with the plasma membrane.

title: Part D
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The response does not include a refutation of the claim by stating that fewer aquaporin channels will result in less/slower water loss compared with water loss from cells with a normal number of aquaporins.
The response includes a refutation of the claim by stating that fewer aquaporin channels will result in less/slower water loss compared with water loss from cells with a normal number of aquaporins.
